# <code>to yaml</code> for formats

<div class='command-title'>Convert table into .yaml/.yml text</div>

## Signature

```> to yaml```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Outputs an YAML string representing the contents of this table
```shell
  > [[foo bar]; ["1" "2"]] | to yaml
```
